Record.ClassificationPath: Inorganic Chemicals/Acids/Acids, Noncarboxylic/Sulfur Acids/Sulfuric Acids/Tetrathionic Acid
Inorganic Chemicals/Sulfur Compounds/Sulfur Acids/Sulfuric Acids/Tetrathionic Acid
Record.Description: A sulfuric acid dimer, formed by disulfide linkage. This compound has been used to prolong coagulation time and as an antidote in cyanide poisoning.
